idea:
Growth Elephant is about creating growth stories of small and medium enterprises (SMEs). we pull up our sleeves and created MARKETING and SALES support models for them wherein SME’s don’t need to create their separate Marketing and Sales departments (Cost of setting up your own departments would run into lakhs). We at ‘Growth Elephant’ bring down those budgetary pressures so that you can spend almost 1/5 th of the costs and get 5 times productivity. 
Team ‘Growth Elephant’ handholds them and gives special support having understood their Marketing and Sales distribution requirements.
name: GROWTHELEPHANT INNOVATIVE BIZ SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We at COLORWALE are a passionate and hardworking team committed to bringing out the beauty of every home. Professional painting  services at your doorstep.If you think that finding a professional painter for your home seems complicated, Colorwale s are here to help!. We employ the best painters in the area, and use the best tools to get quality results on every painting job We want to help you with all of your residential painting needs, both interior and exterior! We are proud to serve the Thane, Mumbai, Navi Mumbai. Our professional painters are looking forward to serving you!
name: colorwale

idea:
Innowayt - from Venya Traveltech I Pvt. Ltd. is a b2b travel platform for DMC's and travel suppliers across the globe to transact seamlessly with travel agents. Tours and Activities globally is currently 80% transacted offline and the market size is $ 118 billion per annum and growing at a healthy 9% p.a.

Innowayt would bring innowaytive products to the b2b travel trade, enhancing the productivity  drastically and at a reasonable cost.


Innowayt is developed by Narayan Mallapur and Vikas Khanduri, both with over 22+ years of experience  each and ably supported by a dedicated, experienced team for Technology and operations.
name: VENYA TRAVELTECH INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED
